alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 2:35PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Tuesday morning, strong south to southwest winds of 10 to 20 MPH, with gusts of 25 to 35 MPH, are expected. Tuesday afternoon and Tuesday night, heavy snow is expected with accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, along with southwest winds of 20 to 30 MPH with gusts up to 50 MPH, diminishing overnight. * WHERE...The Bear River Range, including but not limited to Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM Wednesday. While winds will be strong all day Tuesday, the heaviest snow will likely arrive after 1 PM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to falling and blowing snow, especially Tuesday afternoon and Tuesday night. Strong winds may also result in difficult driving for high profile vehicles. The Tuesday evening commute could be significantly impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
